While in his [[Version 1|three-tailed form]], Naruto creates a [[shadow clone]] that charges a [[Nine-Tails]]-enhanced [[Rasengan]] that implodes in on the enemy who is attacked by it.

[[es:Rasengan de Tres Colas]]
